DESCRIPTION: Set up the mail system as per your needs.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}setmail channel [#Channel]** ~ Sets the support channel for your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **{{prefix}}setmail logs [#Channel]** ~ Sets the log channel for your server. All mails sent and received will be logged here.
EXTENDED_LINE_5: **{{prefix}}setmail roles [@Role | Role ID | Role Name]** ~ Adds or removes the roles that should be @mentioned when a new mail is sent.
ALIASES: Setmail does not have any aliases.
ALREADY_ENABLED: The mail system is already enabled on this server.
ENABLED: The mail system is now enabled on the server.
ALREADY_DISABLED: The mail system is already disabled on this server.
DISABLED: The mail system is now disabled on the server.
SUPPORT_CHANNEL_SET: The support channel is now set. Users can simply type in this channel without a command to send a mail or reply to their mail.
LOG_CHANNEL_SET: The log channel is now set. All mails sent and received will be logged in this channel going forward.
NEED_ROLES: You did not provide any roles to add/remove from the alert roles list.
ALERT_ROLES_UPDATED: The new mail alert roles have been updated.
CATEGORY_UPDATED: The mail category channel has been updated.
